resources.string: No More need to use Brackets, It simply calculates from left to right. Also 0 is the default value of the arguments for all calculations

Can do most Trigonometric calculations correctly. Also try not to use \u03C0 in Trigonometric Calculations and use Degrees as far as possible, because sin \u03C0/2 will result in (sin "\u03C0")/2 which is 0 instead of doing sin (\u03C0/2) which is 1
Press the equals button once in a while if the calculations are large and not displayed on screen due to limited space availability
Reset (press C) it anytime u feel the calculations are wrong
Long press of delete(backspace) resets the display
Press C after doing the first trigonometric calculation if it is to be followed by another trigonometric calculation
